name: Panos Papadimitratos
content: KTH | Panagiotis Papadimitratos Skip to main content Panagiotis PapadimitratosProfessorKungliga Tekniska Högskolanhttps://www.kth.se/profile/papadimDetailsWorks for Division of Software and Computer SystemsTelephone +46 8 790 42 63Unit address Lindstedtsvägen 30E-mail papadim@kth.seRoom547ResearcherResearcher IDORCID IDWeb of Science ResearcherIDScopus IDGoogle Scholar IDResearchGateAbout meI design and build secure networked systems. In an increasingly interconnected world, we'd better be able to trust the systems we use and the information we get. That's basically what we are after with my Networked Systems Security (NSS) group. Our research agenda includes a gamut of security and privacy problems.  We have a strong systems character, implementing and evaluating our solutions. At the same time, we pay close attention to theoretical methods, including, notably, formal protocol analysis and information-theoretic results. NSS group @ linkedIn. NSS group web page.For students: If you are interested in cybersecurity and privacy coursework, please see the Networked Systems Security courses (EP2500, EP2510, EP2520 and their PhD level counterparts, FEP3200, FEP3300, FEP3250, respectively) listed below. If you are interested in doing a project, BSc or MSc thesis, please look for your program-specific code and the NSS group web page for topics. For summer coursework, please see EP250V/FEP3500 for our CySeP summer school.CoursesAdvanced Networked Systems Security (EP2510), examiner, teacher, course responsibleAdvanced Networked Systems
